title: War In The Pacific National Historical Park: Bookstore
body: Bookstore         Friendly staff and plentiful resources await visitors at the Pacific Historic Parks bookstore.   Books and other resources are available from the Pacific Historic Parks bookstore. The bookstore is located inside the T. Stell Newman Visitor Center and is open every day from 9 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. You may also visit the online bookstore through the above link.  Money generated from bookstore sales helps to fund many important educational projects throughout the Pacific region. Thank you for your interest in supporting Pacific Historic Parks!
